text: is a Japanese futsal club, currently playing in the F. League. The team is located in Sumida, Tokyo, Japan. Their main arena is Sumida City Gymnasium. ==Chronicle== {| class="toccolours" style="font-size:93%"; !colspan="2" align=center|Chronicle of Fugador Sumida |- | {| |valign="top" width="33%"| *2001 – Founded *2014-2015 – 6th F.League *2015-2016 – 3rd F.League *2016-2017 – 4th F.League *2017-2018 – 4th F.League *2018-2019 – 7th F.League Division 1 |} |} == Trophies == *All Japan Futsal Championship: **Winners: 2009 ==Sources== * * F.
